content: UFC 280Multi Master Challenge   1st place: 2 mBTC Free Bet2nd place: 1 mBTC Free Bet3rd place: .5 mBTC Free BetThe Rules are similar to the original Sportsbet.io Multi Master that we all enjoyed so muchRulesa)  Predict the winner of each match (earn 1 point)b)  Predict how many Total Strikes Match 14 winner will score (if it's a draw, the highest of the two Total Strikes scored will be used)Odds @ https://sportsbet.io/sports/mma/ufc/ufc-280-oliveira-vs-makhachev/matchesMatches14.  Islam Makhachev vs. Charles Oliveira 13.  Aljamain Sterling vs. TJ Dillashaw 12.  Petr Yan vs. Sean O'Malley11.  Matuesz Gamrot vs. Beneil Dariush10.  Manon Fiorot vs. Katlyn Chookagian 9.  Sean Brady vs. Belal Muhammad 8.  Caio Borralho vs. Makhmud Muradov 7.  Nikita Krylov vs. Volkan Oezdemir 6.  5.  4.  Abubakar Nurmagomedov vs. Gadzhi Omargadzhiev 3.  Armen Petrosyan vs. A.J. Dobson 2.  Muhammad Mokaev vs. Malcolm Gordon 1.  Karol Rosa vs. Lina Lansberg Match 14 winner Total Strikes:Example14.  Islam Makhachev 13.  Aljamain Sterling 12.  Petr Yan 11.  Matuesz Gamrot 10.  Manon Fiorot 9.  Sean Brady 8.  Caio Borralho 7.  Nikita Krylov 6.  5.  4.  Abubakar Nurmagomedov 3.  Armen Petrosyan 2.  Muhammad Mokaev 1.  Karol Rosa Match 14 winner Total Strikes: 80  (Small print)* Prizes will be prioritized based on overall general forum participation and activity *** The declared winners are final and up to my discretion **
